content:
But even now,
The angle of light here hasn't changed at all.

Our world bubble is so tiny,
does that mean our days and nights will change more frequently from now on?

Time seems to pass so slowly here...
Could it be because I'm having such a wonderful time with you all
that my perception has gone a bit wonky?

You know how they say happy times always feel too short?
We've been rushing around for so long,
Yet why does it feel like the light intensity here hasn't changed at all?
